moves.name: Tickle
moves.description: The user tickles the target into laughing, reducing its Attack and Defense stats.

moves.name: Barrier
moves.description: The user throws up a sturdy wall that sharply raises its Defense stat.

moves.name: Confusion
moves.description: The target is hit by a weak telekinetic force. It may also leave the target confused.

moves.name: Copycat
moves.description: The user mimics the move used immediately before it. The move fails if no other move has been used yet.

moves.name: Meditate
moves.description: The user meditates to awaken the power deep within its body and raise its Attack stat.

moves.name: Double Slap
moves.description: The target is slapped repeatedly, back and forth, two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Mimic
moves.description: The user copies the target's last move. The move can be used during battle until the Pokémon is switched out.

moves.name: Encore
moves.description: The user compels the target to keep using only the move it last used for three turns.

moves.name: Light Screen
moves.description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to suppress damage from special attacks for five turns.

moves.name: Reflect
moves.description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to suppress damage from physical attacks for five turns.

moves.name: Psybeam
moves.description: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. It may also cause confusion.

moves.name: Substitute
moves.description: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user's decoy.

moves.name: Recycle
moves.description: The user recycles a held item that has been used in battle so it can be used again.

moves.name: Trick
moves.description: The user catches the target off guard and swaps its held item with its own.

moves.name: Psychic
moves.description: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. It may also reduce the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Role Play
moves.description: The user mimics the target completely, copying the target's natural Ability.

moves.name: Baton Pass
moves.description: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting, passing along any stat changes.

moves.name: Safeguard
moves.description: The user creates a protective field that prevents status problems for five turns.
